author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Aviat Networks Q3 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.49 From Continuing Operations
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Aviat Networks Inc:
* AVIAT NETWORKS ANNOUNCES FISCAL 2018 THIRD QUARTER AND NINE-MONTH FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q3 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.26 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* SEES Q4 2018 REVENUE $63 MILLION TO $70 MILLION * BOARD AUTHORIZED A STOCK REPURCHASE PROGRAM, TO PURCHASE UP TO $7.5 MILLION OF COMMON STOCK Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
